Definition.WordDefinition: envision v 1: imagine; conceive of; see in one's mind; "I can't see him on horseback!"; "I can see what will happen"; "I can see a risk in this strategy" [syn: {visualize}, {visualise}, {project}, {fancy}, {see}, {figure}, {picture}, {image}] 2: picture to oneself; imagine possible; "I cannot envision him as President" [syn: {foresee}]
